data.name: Devils 'n Dragons Arcade
data.detailed_description:
Devils 'n Dragons is a 2D run and fight platformer turn on arcade action. The player fights against evil dead forces, orcs, goblins, dragons and many ugly monsters in various levels such as graveyards, caves, villages, castles, forests... In this stunning funy action you will collect coins, treasures, but you might encourter cursed items !

Key Features

  • 6 armor classes for the hero
  • lot of weapons avaiable (sword, dagger, bomb, hammer, axe, but also dart...
  • various protection spells to pick up like "raise from the dead" who will bring you to life again
  • treasure chests or pots with goodies (new armor, better weapon) but also bad things like darts, curse (frog, duck, dodo, goat, rancoon)
  • multiple categories of enemies
  • Find your way

The game will enhance with new levels and monsters

data.short_description: Devils 'n Dragons is a 2D run and fight platformer turned on arcade action in a medieval fantasy world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 680, AMD R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3.0
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980, AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
